thread.title: PES 2016 Live Roster Update Adds 2,865 Transfers & 1,789 New Players
thread.title_full: PES 2016 Live Roster Update Adds 2,865 Transfers & 1,789 New Players

author: Steve_OS
title: PES 2016 Live Roster Update Adds 2,865 Transfers & 1,789 New Players
text: PES 2016 Live Roster Update Adds 2,865 Transfers & 1,789 New Players 09:09 AM - October 1, 2015 by Steve_OS Konami has kicked off their scheduled weekly roster updates for PES 2016, ensuring that the stats of the game's many stars reflect that of their real-life counterparts. See the full list of changes here . Activate the updated rosters by pressing the R3 button in team selection screens. These updated rosters will be available for online play, in the following modes: Online Divisions
